scripts.build: npm run compile; npm run webpack; npm run uglify
scripts.webpack: node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js lib/main.js dist/hemtjanst.js --config webpack.config.js --mode production --output-library hemtjanst
scripts.combine: npm run compile; npm run webpack; node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js node_modules/mqtt dist/mqtt.js --output-library mqtt; cat dist/hemtjanst.js dist/mqtt.js > dist/hemtjanst-mqtt.js; rm dist/mqtt.js; node node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs -o dist/hemtjanst-mqtt.min.js dist/hemtjanst-mqtt.js
